set.name: SD01
set.longname: Witch Laughing at the Pure Black

set.name: SD02
set.longname: Beast King Raging at the Crimson Red

card.name: Casino of Doom
card.text: [AUTO] When this Territory is opened or at the start of your Main Phase, you can put the top 2 cards of your deck in the graveyard. If you do so, do one of the following depending on the amount of Buster cards contained in the above cards. 0: Target up to 1 unit, destroy it. 1: Put the top card of your life zone to the graveyard. 2: Destroy all units except your units with the title 'Seven Deadly Sins: Greed'.

card.name: Xenos, The One Who Stares
card.text: [CONT] This unit can open any Black Territory (Pay the opening cost)

card.name: Bloom, Soul Gambler
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit battles during your opponent's turn, you can put the top card of your deck to the graveyard. If it is a Buster card, for the rest of this turn this unit gets +5000 Power. Territory (Seven Deadly Sins: Greed): [ACT] (Normal/Rest this unit, Remove 6 cards from your graveyard). Target 1 non-'Taboo' unit from your graveyard with a total energy cost equal or less than the amount of energy you have, place it on your side of the field.

card.name: Liverwort, "Dead Rook"
card.text: Territory: [AUTO] When this unit is placed, for the rest of this turn, all of your opponent's units get -6000 Power.

card.name: Rhyzome, "Black Knight"
card.text: [Decoy] Territory: +3000 Power (Decoy: If this unit is in Rest, your opponent can only attack this unit or other units with Decoy that are in Rest)

card.name: Cursed Trump Card
card.text: Target 1 unit, destroy it

card.name: Hard Luck Claps
card.text: Target 1 unit, for the rest of this turn, it gets -3000 Power

card.name: Freeda, Deep Assault "Trishula"
card.text: [CONT] This unit cannot be blocked. Territory: [AUTO] When this unit is placed, Scout 3. (Scout: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, place any of them on the top or bottom of the deck, in any order.)

card.name: Vienna, Battle Engineer
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit is placed, draw 1 card then discard 1 card.

card.name: Nadia, Heavenly Sniper "Brahmadatta"
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit is placed, draw 1 card. Territory: +3000 Power

card.name: Capital Breaker
card.text: Target 1 unit, deal it 8000 Damage.

card.name: Armament Supply
card.text: Choose 1 of the following: - Target 1 unit, for the rest of this turn, it gets +2000 Power - Target 1 unit with a total cost of 5 or less, for the rest of this turn, it gets -1 Hit

card.name: Bottomless Great Canyon
card.text: [CONT] During your turn, your units get +3000 Power and [Blitz]. [CONT] If you have 8 or more energy, your Ace units get +1 Hit. (Blitz: This unit deals battle damage first.)

card.name: Eledophas, Raging Great Elephant
card.text: Territory: [AUTO] When this unit wins a battle, put the top card of your deck to your energy zone as Rest. Then, if your life is in the Red Zone, target 1 of your opponent's units, this unit and the targeted unit deal damage to each other equal to their power.

card.name: Rabian, Lunarhare of the Lamp
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit is destroyed,you can put the foremost card of your life zone into your energy zone. Territory: +3000 Power.

card.name: Lionel, Indomitable Lion
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit wins a battle, Stand this unit. Territory (Beast King): [AUTO] When this unit is destroyed, you can pay 1[Red] 2[Colourless]. If you do, at the start of the End Phase, place this unit from your graveyard to your side of the field.

card.name: Fourinawr, Blazing Eyes
card.text: [CONT] This unit can open any Red Territory (Pay the opening cost)

card.name: Surprise Attack
card.text: Target up to 1 unit, Rest it, draw 1 card.

card.name: Beast King's Wrath
card.text: Target 1 of your units, for the rest of this turn, it gets +2000 Power. Then, target 1 of your opponent's units, this unit and the unit targeted previously deal Damage to each other equal to to their Power.

card.name: Baongul, Sacred Beast
card.text: [Decoy] Territory: +3000 Power. (Decoy: If this unit is in Rest, your opponent can only attack this unit or other units with Decoy that are in Rest)

card.name: Albel, Angel of Rapiers
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit is placed, target 1 of your units, for the rest of this turn, it gets +3000 Power.

card.name: Embracing Angel, Elviyu
card.text: Territory: [Decoy] Territory: [AUTO] When this unit battles during your opponent's turn, for that turn, this unit gets +3000 Power. (Decoy: If this unit is in Rest, your opponent can only attack this unit or other units with Decoy that are in Rest)

card.name: Sword of Reason
card.text: Choose 1 of the following: - Target 1 unit, for the rest of the turn, it gains +2000 Power. - Target 1 of your opponent's units with a total cost 5 or less, return it their hand.

card.name: Shackles of Ethics
card.text: Target 1 unit, return it to the top of the deck.

card.name: Demonic Palace of Miasma
card.text: [AUTO] When this Territory is opened, target 1 unit from your graveyard with a total cost of 4 or less, place it on your side of the field. [AUTO] When your attacking unit is destroyed while battling, destroy the opponent's defending unit if its cost is equal or less to the cost of your destroyed unit +2.

card.name: Ominous Concierge
card.text: [AUTO] When your unit is destroyed, for the rest of this turn, this unit gets +3000 Power. Territory: [CONT] If you have 5 or more cards in your graveyard, this card's cost is reduced by (2 Colourless) energy (Its total cost is also reduced). This ability is active if this card is in your hand or the graveyard.

card.name: Ambition Eater
card.text: [Decoy] [AUTO] When this unit is destroyed, draw 1 card. (Decoy: If this unit is in Rest, your opponent can only attack this unit or other units with Decoy that are in Rest)

card.name: Empress of Snakes
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit is placed, if you have 10 or more cards in your graveyard: Target 1 of the opponent's units. For the rest of this turn, that unit gets -5000 Power.

card.name: Casket Mason
card.text: [AUTO] At the start of your End Phase, look at the top card of your deck. Then either put it back at the top of the deck or put it in your graveyard.

card.name: Grudge Watcher
card.text: [AUTO] If this unit was destroyed by battle and your life is in the Red Zone, destroy the enemy unit that battled this unit if its total cost is 6 or less.

card.name: Bestaura, Smiling at Death
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit is destroyed, target 1 non-""Taboo"" unit from your graveyard, add it to your hand. Territory: +3000 Power.

card.name: Margulis, Evil-Eye Demon Lord
card.text: [CONT] This unit can also attack units in Stand Territory (Seven Deadly Sins: Wrath): [AUTO] At the start of your End Phase, if this unit attacked this turn, put the opponent's foremost life card in their graveyard.

card.name: Chainsaw Clown
card.text: Territory: [AUTO] When this unit is placed from hand, target 1 of your opponent's non-Buster units. For the rest of this turn, it gets -5500 Power.

card.name: Parasitic Viper
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit is destroyed, target 1 of your opponent's units with a total cost of 3 or less, destroy it.

card.name: Megaclid, Two-fold Fear
card.text: [ACT] (Quick/3[Colourless]) For this turn, when this unit is destroyed, place it from your graveyard as Rest. Territory: +3000 Power

card.name: Blood Enforcer
card.text: [CONT] If your life is in the Red Zone, this unit gets +3000 Power.

card.name: Painful Roamer
card.text: [AUTO] When this unit is placed, put the top card of your deck and the frontmost card of your life zone in the graveyard.

card.name: Endaive, "Mad Bishop"
card.text: [Decoy] Territory: [AUTO] When this unit is destroyed, you can Remove it from your graveyard. If you do so, target 1 command from the opponent's graveyard and play it without paying its cost. When that command is put in the graveyard again, remove it instead. (Decoy: If this unit is in Rest, your opponent can only attack this unit or other units with Decoy that are in Rest)

card.name: Lucky Provider
card.text: [ACT] (Normal/Rest this unit) Put the top card from both players' decks to their respective graveyards.If both of those cards are units, then target a player, that player put their frontmost card of their lifezone in the graveyard.

card.name: Waiter On Repeat
card.text: [ACT] (Normal/1 Colourless) For this turn, when this unit is destroyed, place it from your graveyard as Rest.

card.name: Crown Usurpation

card.text: Target 1 unit, for the rest of this turn, it gets -6000 Power, -1 Hit

card.name: Slots of Devastation

card.name: One Night's Nightmare
card.text: Target 1 unit from either player's graveyard with a total cost that is equal or less than your energy. Place it on your side of the field. At the start of the end phase, Remove that unit.

card.name: Strongpoint Barbabylon
card.text: [AUTO] When you play a command with a total cost of 5 or less, you can Remove 1 card from your hand. If you do so, that command is copied ((You cannot copy another copy. You can choose new targets for the effects of the copy)
